title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER AND SIGN INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH THE GENERIKA DRUGSTORE, A DULY ORGANIZED LOCAL BUSINESS WITH OFFICE ADDRESS AT #8707 MARKET SITE, BARANGAY BATONG MALAKE, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA AS PARTNER IN THE PROVISION AND / OR DISPENSING OF MEDICINES TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES UNDER THE DAMAYAN SA KAPWA PROGRAM AND RATIFYING THE SAME THEREAFTER.
